spec.description: Path to the agent specification file

output-dir.description: Directory where the authoring bundle files will be generated. If not specified, defaults to force-app/main/default/aiAuthoringBundle

name.description: Name (label) of the authoring bundle. If not provided, you will be prompted for it.

target-org.description: A username or alias for the target org

api-version.description: Override the api version used for api requests made by this command
